[[Image:Wickendon Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Wickendon on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Wickendon''' is a town in the [[Vale of Arryn]], the region controlled by [[House Arryn]] of [[the Eyrie]]. The town is on the southern coast of the Vale, just across the bay from [[Maidenpool]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/the-eyrie/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, the Eyrie entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/the-vale-of-arryn/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, The Vale of Arryn entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the town's name is spelled Wickenden. It is the seat of House Waxley and is on the northern edge of the Bay of Crabs.
